self.title: CDISC Questionnaire C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent Test Code Terminology

definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent test code.
name: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you thought about being dead or what it would be like to be dead? Have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and never wake up? Do you ever wish you weren't alive anymore? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Wish to be Dead (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you thought about being dead or what it would be like to be dead? Have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and never wake up? Do you ever wish you weren't alive anymore? (Past 1 Month).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Wish to be Dead (Past 1 Month)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of wishing to be dead.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of Wish to be Dead

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you thought about doing something to make yourself not alive anymore? Have you had any thoughts about killing yourself? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you thought about doing something to make yourself not alive anymore? Have you had any thoughts about killing yourself? (Past 1 Month).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts (Past 1 Month)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of non-specific active suicidal thoughts.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you thought about how you would do that or how you would make yourself not alive anymore (kill yourself)? What did you think about? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Active Suicidal Ideation With Any Methods (Not Plan) Without Intent to Act (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you thought about how you would do that or how you would make yourself not alive anymore (kill yourself)? What did you think about? (Past 1 Month).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Active Suicidal Ideation With Any Methods (Not Plan) Without Intent to Act (Past 1 Month)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of active suicidal ideation with any methods (not plan) without intent to act.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of Active Suicidal Ideation With Any Methods (Not Plan) Without Intent to Act
synonyms: CSS10-Idea, No Intent, No Plan, Describe

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - When you thought about making yourself not alive anymore (or killing yourself), did you think that this was something you might actually do? This is different from (as opposed to) having the thoughts but knowing you wouldn't do anything about it. (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Active Suicidal Ideation With Some Intent to Act, Without Specific Plan (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - When you thought about making yourself not alive anymore (or killing yourself), did you think that this was something you might actually do? This is different from (as opposed to) having the thoughts but knowing you wouldn't do anything about it. (Past 1 Month).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Active Suicidal Ideation With Some Intent to Act, Without Specific Plan (Past 1 Month)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of active suicidal ideation with some intent to act, without specific plan.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of Active Suicidal Ideation With Some Intent to Act, Without Specific Plan

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you ever decided how or when you would make yourself not alive anymore/kill yourself? Have you ever planned out (worked out the details of) how you would do it? What was your plan? When you made this plan (or worked out these details), was any part of you thinking about actually doing it? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Active Suicidal Ideation With Specific Plan and Intent (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Have you ever decided how or when you would make yourself not alive anymore/kill yourself? Have you ever planned out (worked out the details of) how you would do it? What was your plan? When you made this plan (or worked out these details), was any part of you thinking about actually doing it? (Past 1 Month).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Active Suicidal Ideation With Specific Plan and Intent (Past 1 Month)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of active suicidal ideation with specific plan and intent.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Description of Active Suicidal Ideation With Specific Plan and Intent

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Did you ever do anything to try to kill yourself or make yourself not alive anymore? What did you do? Did you ever hurt yourself on purpose? Why did you do that? (Lifetime).

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Has there been a time when you started to do something to make yourself not alive anymore (end your life or kill yourself) but someone or something stopped you before you actually did anything? What did you do? (Lifetime).

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Pediatric/Cognitively Impaired Lifetime/Recent - Has there been a time when you started to do something to make yourself not alive anymore (end your life or kill yourself) but someone or something stopped you before you actually did anything?
